mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yw_community_login_statistics ( date, type, community_id, number ) VALUES ( #{date},#{type},#{communityId},#{number}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE number = VALUES (number)
mapper.select: SELECT l.date,sum(l.number) as number,c.name FROM yw_community_login_statistics l LEFT JOIN yw_community c ON c.id=l.community_id where c.city_code = #{cityCode} and l.date >= #{startTime} and l.date<=#{endTime} GROUP BY l.community_id order by l.community_id,number desc
